text: Baudette International Airport is an airport available to the public. The airport is owned by the county of Lake of the Woods in Minnesota. The airport is near a the city of Baudette, Minnesota. page at Minnesota DOT airport directory The airport has one asphalt runway numbered 12/30. The airport also has a landing area for seaplanes on the Rainy River. ==References== Category:Airports in Minnesota
title: Baudette International Airport
